repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:14.04 
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y build-essential csh && apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

ADD . /opt/rom 

RUN cd /opt/rom/src && make -k 
RUN mkdir -p /opt/rom/log 
RUN mkdir -p /opt/rom/player 

WORKDIR /opt/rom/area 

VOLUME [ "/opt/rom" ] 
EXPOSE 4000 
ENTRYPOINT [ "./startup" ]
